docTitle.titlePart:
Particle generation during reactive magnetron sputtering of
SiO 2 with cylindrical and planar cathodes

byline.affiliation: Fraunhofer Institute for Surface Engineering and Thin Films,

front.div:
Abstract: SiO 2 layers were deposited by pulsed reactive magnetron sputtering with cylindrical
and planar dual magnetrons. The particle density in SiO 2 films deposited at different process
parameters is analyzed.
front.keyword: OCIS codes: 310.1860 Thin films, Deposition and fabrication, 310.3840 Materials and process characterization
